casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Kipp Mendez WIGGINS Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 4, 2017

Robert L. O'Brien, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Nancy L. Chupak, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 159 Conn.App. 598, 124 A.3d 902 (2015), is denied.
